alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:32AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Humboldt County through 600 AM PDT... At 531 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Orovada, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kings River Valley and Thacker Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
